subject: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Michael Goldsmith is fighting Lou Gehrig’s disease and is suggesting that Major League Baseball help raise funds for research by honoring Gehrig on the 70th anniversary of his retirement.
snippet: Michael Goldsmith is fighting Lou Gehrig’s disease and is suggesting that Major League Baseball help raise funds for research by honoring Gehrig on the 70th anniversary of his retirement.
